name: Click Through Time and Space
description:
This game was made for the clicker jam. At the moment it's in its early prototype state and will most likely have some bugs since because of lack of time no real playthrough could be made.

We're happy for every feedback. Thanks so much and have fun.

...

A clicker game where you travel through time and space to see new places. 

At the moment you can visit the felumines in the nebula desert and help them building fish farms and a proper way of living. 

...

Controls:

Click Space to continue dialogue
